title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin about a man and a woman

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing a dream about engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a man and a woman Dealing with the dream has many interpretations, because we know that every girl and every young man wants to take the engagement step to prepare for. Marriage, and since engagement is an event that brings joy and happiness to people, seeing it in a dream means a lot. There are different interpretations, and a man’s interpretation is completely different from what he saw in a man’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a woman in detail. Seeing engagement in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of marriage to a good man. Seeing a girl’s commitment in an unmarried girl’s dream, and this vision was on Friday, is a sign of goodness and happiness. .Seeing a girl in a dream engaging him in a dream, this vision is worthy of praise. If a girl dreams that she is engaged and going to an engagement party, this means that the groom is not suitable. Seeing a girl engaging her in a dream means marrying a man of high value. If a girl sees in a dream That she is engaged to her lover, this indicates her strong desire to marry her lover. Sharing a girl in a dream with her lover means good nutrition. If a girl dreams that she is watching her friend’s engagement and the girl is already engaged, this means that her fiancé is not suitable for her. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with ManSeeing a man in a dream that he is engaged to a girl means that this person is looking for worldly pleasures. Seeing a man in a dream, proposing to marry a beautiful girl, is a sign of joy and happiness. Seeing commitment in a man’s dream indicates his desire to achieve certain desired goals. If a man sees in Dreaming of an engaged girl, this is a sign of comfort, happiness, and obtaining money and livelihood. If a man dreams that he is witnessing an engagement, this indicates a blessing and a change in his life for the better. Seeing a virgin girl’s engagement is evidence that this man will achieve his goal. Seeing a poor man drowning in a dream is A sign of his approaching condition. Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a married woman: Seeing a married woman engaged to a deceased person in a dream is evidence of the kindness and livelihood that she will receive. Seeing an engagement ring or engagement ring and engagement dresses in a dream is a sign of the goodness and benefits that will accrue to her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about engagement Ibn Sirin: Seeing a girl’s engagement in a young man’s dream carrying a taxi is a sign of kindness and the achievement of any goals. Seeing commitment Virgo girl is a sign of kindness and the dreamer will get a prestigious and wonderful job. Seeing someone attending an engagement indicates the fulfillment of all his goals and desires. Seeing commitment in general is evidence that the dreamer He achieves everything he wants and strives to achieve. Interpretation of engagement in a dream for a divorced woman. Engagement in a dream for a divorced woman means that someone will meet the person he has dreamed of all his life, but the engagement did not bring them together and there will be other help from the man and this will make her very happy. Interpretation of a dream about my daughter’s engagement when she sees A mother is getting engaged to her daughter in a dream, this indicates that many positive changes will occur in this daughter’s life in the coming period. If this girl is

title: Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing corn in a dream and its meaning raises many questions. Corn is one of the delicious foods that everyone prefers, and in the following lines we will learn together the interpretation of seeing corn with all the interpretations related to it. You may also be interested in the following: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream and its meaning for a single woman Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream and its meaning In the interpretation of seeing corn in a dream of an unmarried woman, this is a sign of the approaching date of her engagement or marriage to a wealthy man with whom she will live in stability and reassurance. Corn in a person's dream is a sign of comfort, prosperity and satisfaction, and as for an unmarried woman who sees herself buying corn, this means that she will fall into annoying financial problems. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is walking on a white person, this is abundant good news for the dreamer where he does not expect it. As for an unmarried woman who saw yellow corn in her dream, the interpretation indicated that it is a sign of death, as the dreamer may be exposed to the loss of a loved one. Also, yellow corn indicates a tight situation for unmarried people, as they live in distress and a limited lifestyle. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is walking in the middle of a cornfield, this indicates obstacles that You will face it on your way to reaching your goal. You may be interested: Entering the Police Academy in a dream Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream and its meaning for a married woman Seeing corn for a married woman in her dream is good news about achieving what she has been praying for for a long time, and God will give her abundance. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is buying corn, she will live in a new house that guarantees her complete privacy. If a married woman sees a lot of corn in a dream, the number of those she saw will be her source of livelihood. As for a married woman who harvests corn from the field in her dream, this indicates an abundance of livelihood that will come in the form of a lot of money for her and her husband. In general, corn in a married woman’s dream may be able to get out of a difficult financial crisis and overcome its negative consequences. Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream and its meaning for a pregnant woman Corn in a pregnant woman’s dream is a good vision that indicates an improvement in her mental and physical health and that her pregnancy period will pass peacefully. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is eating corn, this means that her birth will be easy, God willing, and she will have twins. As for buying corn in a pregnant woman’s dream, this indicates her readiness to dress her future child. While a pregnant woman saw that she Roasting yellow corn, this is a malicious vision of being exposed to a health problem that leads to the loss of her fetus. Eating boiled corn in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of nourishing her future child, and God will give her a lot of good during his birth. You may also be interested in: Background in a dream Interpretation of seeing corn in a dream and its meaning for Al-Nabulsi In the interpretation of seeing corn in the dreamer’s dream, he mentioned that it is a good dream that there is no need to worry about, because it portends successive positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life and he must prepare for them. Seeing green corn fields in a dream suggests to the dreamer

title: Interpretation of seeing a black and white striped snake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a black and white striped snake in a dream It is one of the worst dreams one can have because seeing reptiles in general and snakes in particular has frightening interpretations and does not bode well at all due to the fact that snakes are among the most dangerous animals to humans, both in reality and in reality. You may be interested: Talking with the dead in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a black and white striped snake in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a black and white striped snake in a dreamOne of the most dangerous dreams that an unmarried girl can dream is that she sees in a dream a black and white snake: The first interpretation of seeing this dream is that the girl has an enemy Very close to her in real life, this enemy cannot be easily detected because she is deformed, in addition to possessing extremely cunning and malicious qualities. He wants to harm the girl in any way, and there is another interpretation that says that the snake connects white and black, so it appears that the channel has a person in her life who represents that he is close to her and loves goodness. But he is one of the most hateful and jealous, and the girl does not consider him primarily among the people who hate her, but she sees him as a dear person and this will hurt her a lot in her life. You may also be interested in: Pumpkins in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a black and white striped snake for a pregnant woman. Most interpretations of seeing a black and white striped snake for a woman warn A pregnant woman is afraid that something will happen to her or her pregnancy, and there are only a few good interpretations about this dream for her: If she has this dream at the end of her pregnancy, this means that her birth will falter and she will find some difficulty. As for his interpretation of seeing it in the first three months of pregnancy It warns against aborting a pregnancy for no reason. You may also be interested in the following: I saw my husband getting married. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a white snake spotted with black. When seeing this dream, its interpretations vary according to the viewer, whether he is a man or an unmarried girl, pregnant or married, and based on that There is a difference in the quality of interpretations between good and evil: If the dreamer is a married woman and the interpretation of this is that there is a notorious, evil woman who is constantly monitoring her husband and her life, but if the person and the man in the dream kill this snake, then this is a metaphorical analogy. For his ability to get rid of evil and evil people once and for all, but if in a dream a snake walks and goes to the traveler, because it warns of the presence of a woman of reputation and character who approaches this man because she wants to. Court him completely illegally. You may also be interested in the following: Seeing a promise in a dreamInterpretation of a black and white snake attack in a dreamIf the dream is about being attacked by a snake, most interpretations confirm that enemies and haters can really hurt the dreamer: Attack by a group of Snakes on the fortuneteller means that a group of people are gathering to harm that person. A second interpretation is that this person’s life is full of envy and hatred on the part of other people surrounding the viewer. If a small snake is attacked, this means...

title: Interpretation of the vision of ablution by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing washing in a dream. Interpretation of seeing washing with milk in a dream means that the person who has this vision is a religious person. If he wants to wash but does not find water, this means that it is difficult to achieve what he wants, but he will get what he wants in the end. The dream of washing means goodness in your life. And money, and your son, and your wife, and everything that you fear and dread. If ablution is performed with very hot water at the boiling point, this means serious distress or that you have contracted an illness. If he fears for someone, or fears calamities, then bathing is safer for you than what you fear. A debtor has a dream about bathing. It means deliverance from debt and soon you will spend it by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about washing by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi said: Washing a person twice means increasing goodness. An indication of the imminent hearing of something close to comfort or an imminent realization of the events that await you. A man who dreams that he is praying without ablution means that he has work but no Money. If you turn to pray but not in the direction of the Qiblah, it means that you want to do something, but you are still confused, you have not made a decision yet. If you perform ablution and do good, your sins will be forgiven by the command of Almighty God. While if you cannot complete the ablution, You are trying to reach things that make it difficult for you. Interpretation of seeing someone doing the washing: Dreaming that one of the people you know is washing in front of you, or you see him in a dream, means that harm will happen to him, and this harm is caused by you, and it may mean that you are causing this person. To be exposed, while if you dream that you are the one doing the laundry and someone accompanies you, then this is an indication of the inheritance that you will receive. If you find yourself doing the laundry while you are still in your bed, this means that the death of a loved one or a loved one is approaching your person, Washing can indicate trust in you, which you must give to its owner. Interpretation of a dream about washing for a single woman: Interpretation of seeing a virgin washing means that she is an upright, pure girl who abstains from forbidden things and fears God Almighty. It means achieving what he has dreamed of for a long time, and this desire that was thought to be impossible. Light in Mecca means to marry someone with whom you will be happy. The word Fus generally means the young man who proposes to her, and if she gets engaged, it means marriage. Commentators have indicated that washing and praying in a dream for an unmarried woman is to fulfill a need. Shamloul welcomes the comments. If you have a vision and want to know the interpretation, you can leave this vision in a comment below the article, where it will be interpreted and answered as quickly as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream: It is a strange and impressive dream. It is not usual for a person to see in his sleep the Crown Prince or one of the prominent political figures, so we find that there are questions raised about the repercussions of this vision, and on Mohammed bin. Salman the Crown Prince has many reforms in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. He is one of the most beloved figures and has a huge fan base of support, and in this article we will talk about him. Interpretation of a dream in which the Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman sees. Salman, the Crown Prince of the Kingdom, then this is a promising dream for her, as this indicates that she will receive good news, and the vision shows good luck for the dreamer, and here is everything that symbolizes the vision of Mohammed bin Salman in a married woman’s dream. A married woman suffers from delayed childbearing, so if she sees Mohammed bin Salman in her dream means that she will become pregnant soon. The dream also indicates the abundant sustenance that the dreamer will receive and the fulfillment of desires. If a married woman is facing some pressures and problems in the current period, this means that the problems will end soon. Seeing an heir indicates stability in the dreamer’s life The vision means great material discoveries for a married woman. If the dreamer suffers from poverty and debts, then seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman means paying off her debts, regardless of their size. While if a married woman faces health problems, the vision portends a speedy recovery for her. See also: Interpretation of a dream Seeing someone falling from a height in a dream. Interpretation of dreams to see Mohammed bin Salman and talk to him about a pregnant woman. Seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream for a pregnant woman is a praiseworthy dream. This dream, in case he sees that he is exchanging the funniest conversations with the Crown Prince, carries the clues shown below:If a pregnant woman feels anxious in a dream to see the heir, it means that she will have livelihood in the near future.If the pregnant woman is having some problems with her husband and sees... Muhammad Salman, this means the end of the problems between them and means that the relationship will return to what it was. Exchanging conversations with the heir in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will be saved from the problems she faced during pregnancy. This also means that she will have a healthy child. Commentators pointed out that talking with the prince and the prince Covenant in a dream means giving birth to a healthy child in reality. The vision also suggests ease of childbirth, as well as relief from the aches and pains that the viewer suffered during pregnancy. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a pregnant woman in a dream. Encrypted Muhammad bin Salman in dreams for divorced women. A divorced woman who was divorcing her husband if she saw Muhammad bin Salman in her dream is one of the dreams that commentators praised and considered to bring her goodness and nourishment. The sign and symbol of Muhammad bin Salman in a dream for a divorced woman came as follows: For a divorced woman to see in a dream that she is talking to the heir, this means that she meets a good man who loves her and means her marriage to him. If she sees

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the death of a selfie in a dream. You are asking for interpretations of what you see. In the following lines we present the interpretation of a dream about the death of a selfie in a dream, all of this and many details that interest you..Interpretation of a dream about the death of a selfie in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a selfie in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this and with Therefore, seeing a person die in a dream could be a sign of age and health, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees the death of a person in a dream, this may express that she will be exposed to some bad things, and God knows best. Also, seeing the death of a person in a dream could indicate despair. God is Most High and knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my predecessor seducing my husband in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my predecessor who seduced my husband in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this. While you see your predecessor’s love for your husband, this may lead to some problems that concern the dreamer, and God knows the unseen, as it may indicate the interference of the predecessor in his affairs, and God knows best. Therefore When a married woman sees in a dream her predecessor in love with her husband, this may be evidence of disagreements with those below them, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a Salafist hitting me in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a Salafist hitting me in a dream could be evidence of her benefit to her predecessor, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman is seen She hits her predecessor, as this may lead to her predecessor advising her, and God knows everything that no one has seen. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in a dream: There are many preachers and sheikhs who understand people in religion and teach us many rulings that are not found in the legal evidence, whether from the Sunnah or the Holy Qur’an, on various issues that surround us, while Sheikh Al-Sarawi, who is the Egyptian Minister of Endowments, has many Among the religious works on interpreting the Holy Qur’an and interpreting dreams, he provided many fatwas and millions of Muslims prefer to follow him. Interpretation of the dream of seeing Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in a dream: Al-Shaarawi is characterized by many good qualities that made him beloved by everyone who hears or sees him, while the dream of seeing Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in a dream can indicate The dreamer has many interpretations, the most important of which are: This vision can be interpreted by many interpreters as a vision of goodness. It can also be considered one of the signs of justice that the dreamer distinguishes. This vision is also considered one of the dreams in which the dreamer will achieve the dreams he wants. When you see An unmarried girl sees this vision, it is considered an indication of her praiseworthy qualities and reputation. She came to the vision of Al-Shaarawi as a sign of the dreamer’s closeness to God and loves to get closer to God through many deeds, words, and deeds. It is also considered his vision of abandoning sins and sins and getting closer to God Almighty. Whereas, Al-Shaarawi Seeing a married woman is evidence of her good condition. See also: Interpretation of seeing the number three in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its repercussions. The dream of seeing sheikhs and scholars in a dream. Many of us may see many sheikhs and scholars in our dreams and they may ask why we saw them and what sign they bring, while seeing sheikhs and scholars in The dream may indicate the following: - This vision can be considered one of the signs of the strength of faith that characterizes the dreamer. It is also an indication that the dreamer is distinguished as one of the personalities who love knowledge and jurisprudence in religious matters. It should be noted that the vision of scholars, thinkers, and lawyers can indicate comfort. Of tension and anxiety. It is also a sign that the dreamer will obtain prestigious positions. Seeing him in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the collapse of marital disputes. If a man sees him, this indicates the livelihood that he will obtain. Dreaming of seeing the death of Sheikh Al-SarawiIt is possible that we dream of people that we can see or watch. In many programs, it is worth noting that Al-Shaarawy is a familiar personality and a famous preacher, and a dream about the death of Sheikh Al-Shaarawi may indicate the following: -If an unmarried girl sees this dream, it can be considered evidence of her distance from God and she must approach Him in several ways. Just as a married woman saw This dream indicates many problems and difficulties in her next life. If the death of Sheikh Al-Shaarawi is seen in a man’s dream, this means that he may be exposed to difficulties and pressures in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its consequences Shaking hands with Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in a dream can be considered Al-Shaarawi is one of the senior sheikhs who is famous for

title: Interpretation of Bisht in a dream

preview.html: Many seek to interpret the bisht in a dream, as this vision has many people, especially in the Gulf countries, where it is considered the basic dress for men on Gulf occasions, and the bisht is the main dress of Arab rulers and kings and it is a cloak worn over the dress. Wearing the bisht is not a new thing, but it is wearing it. Since the time of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, and Jesus, peace be upon him, according to artistic drawings of Jews and Christians. We mention below the interpretation of seeing it in a dream in an encyclopedia according to dream interpretation scholars. Interpretation of the bisht in a dream. The interpretation of seeing the bisht in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, is divided into two parts, and we separate it as follows: Seeing the black bisht: It symbolizes the veil in the case of the woman who sees it, as it is evidence of her secrecy. Her good behavior among people and seeing that it is good and common food, in addition to that it symbolizes the woman’s husband, father, and father-in-law. Male sisters, in the event that the fortuneteller is a man, then wearing it in a dream indicates marriage, near the beginning of a happy life. Seeing a white bisht in a dream Seeing a white bisht in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s circumstances have changed for the better religiously. A gift of a bisht in a dream We can interpret seeing a gift of a bisht in a dream In the following ways: If a man sees that someone has given him a bisht, then this is good news of the imminent marriage of the unmarried person, and good offspring for the married person, and God Almighty knows best. A man’s vision shows that a person of high rank has given him a bisht, which indicates a high status, and also indicates marriage to A family of honorable origin. Giving a bisht in a dream to an unmarried woman indicates the approach of her marriage to a good and important man. A husband giving his wife a bisht in a dream is good news of a soon-to-be pregnant woman with good offspring. For a pregnant woman to see that someone gave her a bisht in a dream indicates God Almighty gives her good tidings of easy childbirth and the safety of herself and her fetus. Beige besht in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing beige besht in a dream varies depending on its color. Below is an interpretation of a single woman seeing a beige bisht in a dream: A beige bisht in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that a good man with a high status will propose to her. A bisht made of leather symbolizes her marriage to a brave man who will have a God-fearing bond and help her. A torn bisht indicates In the dream of an unmarried woman, it indicates the problems that she will face in the next life. Seeing a man wearing a bisht in a dream. Seeing a bisht in a dream is good and a source of goodness for the dreamer, and we say it as follows: A man seeing a bisht in a dream indicates a change in his status for the better in religious and worldly matters. If the man is single It is good for him to marry a beautiful girl. The bisht, when a married man sees her, symbolizes that his wife will bear good offspring that will be pious for him and his wife. Seeing a man wearing the bisht and walking with him in the middle of the crowd indicates that he has been promoted from work and has prestigious positions. If the man sees that He has one bisht, so he bought another, as this indicates that he will marry again. Seeing the husband wearing the bisht. The husband wearing the bisht in his wife’s dream symbolizes the goodness and livelihood the husband will obtain in this world and God Almighty’s satisfaction with him.

title: Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of twins in a dream or dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or the real Imam through the vision website Roy2a.com, twins are actually one of the recurring visions for many people and seeing twin boys in a dream can indicate goodness, or Perhaps it is a warning or warning of the appearance of evil, and the interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of twin boys, whether they are single, married, pregnant, or divorced, with different meanings of the day. Through the vision website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing twin boys in a dream based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin or Ibn Sirin. Kathir, Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing twins in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing twins in a dream is an indication of a feeling of security, comfort, and reassurance. Dreaming of twins in a dream is evidence of the end of problems and difficulties in practical and daily life. Seeing angry twins in a dream is a sign of the coming Many troubles for the pioneer. Dreaming of giving birth to twins for a man is a sign that you will obtain a lot of money. Seeing the birth of twins in one dream is evidence that she is driven by her desires. Dreaming of giving birth to twins for a married woman who is not pregnant is evidence of marital instability and the emergence of problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing twins in Dream: What is the interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a married woman: Seeing twins in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the coming of worries and sorrows for the pioneer. Seeing twins in a married woman’s dream is a sign of future crises and financial losses for her husband. Seeing twins for boys and girls for a married woman is a sign of the coming of comfort and happiness. Dreaming of the birth of twins for a married woman is a symbol of obtaining a lot. Of food and goodness. What is the interpretation of seeing the birth of twins in a dream for a single woman: Seeing the birth of twins in a dream for single women is evidence that she is exposed to many problems and difficulties in her life. Dreaming of giving birth to twins in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the immoral actions that you do and follow your lusts. Male and female, for a single woman, indicating engagement and then separation. See also: Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream. Seeing male twins in a dream for a married woman: Dreaming of male twins in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the beginning of illness or pain. Seeing the birth of twins in a dream for a married woman who is not pregnant is evidence of poverty and suffering. And the emergence of many problems with her husband. What is the interpretation of a dream about two children? Seeing the birth of two children in a dream is a sign of loss of money and poverty. Seeing the birth of twins and two boys indicates the search for money, but this money disappears quickly. Dreaming that there are two children playing happily is a sign of the arrival of happiness and joy to the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of seeing the words of God in the sky in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about twins for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that she is giving birth to twin boys, this is evidence that she is suffering from severe pain during pregnancy. Dreaming of twins in a pregnant woman’s dream is a symbol of pain during pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing the birth of twins From children to pregnant women, it may indicate the appearance of the disease after childbirth. See also: Interpretation of seeing pregnancy in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing cement in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cement in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Cement is considered one of the basic materials in construction that makes the building strong against natural and environmental influences. Today, through this article, we will present to you the interpretation of seeing cement in a dream according to the great translators, such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and others. Dream interpretation scholars, according to the status of the dreamer, whether he is male, single, or married, follow us. Interpretation of cement in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing cement in a dream, which indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness, blessings, and blessings. Seeing a dream that you are building a house with cement, which indicates The success and success that the dreamer has achieved in his life thanks to God’s grace and favor upon him. Mixing cement in a dream indicates the pursuit of insight in his life in order to achieve all his ambitions and goals in life. Rotten cement in a dream indicates the dreamer’s attachment to unreal things and his preoccupation with many illusions. Seeing dried cement In a dream, it indicates that the monarch is a strong person and has the ability to overcome any difficulties and crises in his life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a building and buildings in a dream. Interpretation of seeing cement in a dream for a single woman. Seeing one cement in a dream announces that she will rise to prominence in her scientific and professional life. Dream of building a house With cement, this indicates that she will soon marry a person with good morals and a good reputation. Cement and clay in a single woman’s dream shows that she does not trust people easily and is always cautious with them. Seeing an unmarried woman, cement cracking after construction in a dream shows that she will separate from the person she is attached to and will feel With a lot of sadness and misery. Eating cement in a dream for a single woman indicates that she will extend a helping hand to those close to her, and God knows best. See other interpretations: Interpretation of a dream about building with bricks or bricks. Interpretation of seeing cement in a dream for a married woman. White cement in a dream for a married woman, and this indicates that God will provide her with a lot. Of goodness, livelihood and blessings for her and her family. Seeing a married woman in a cement house in a dream indicates a strong love and relationship between her and her husband. A bag of cement in a dream for a married woman indicates that she is a woman who has many good qualities and strives hard for her husband and children. A married woman sees Her husband builds a house out of cement in a dream. It indicates that many promising things have happened in her husband’s professional life. Black cement in a dream for a married woman shows the many differences and problems between her and her husband, but they will end quickly. Interpretation of seeing cement in a dream for a pregnant woman. Buying cement in a dream for a pregnant woman announces that she will give birth to a boy. And God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman walking on cement in a dream shows that she will undergo an easy and affordable birth. Interpretation of seeing cement in a dream for a man. Seeing a man carrying cement in a dream indicates that he will soon travel outside his country for work and livelihood. Cement falling in the
